data.text: @PatemanSimon @ClareCraigPath Austerity quadrupled the waiting list through not funding the NHS correctly.

@PatemanSimon @ClareCraigPath Yes, we can keep "chucking money at it" because it's been massively UNDERFUNDED for years.

That's why it's in the mess it is

@PatemanSimon @ClareCraigPath Privatising it won't improve the situation.

Look at the USA. People either facing bankruptcy or going without medication as the can't afford it or treatment.

@NotRight510710 @ClareCraigPath My point is / question the NHS has £xb per year from the tax payer how does that compare to a private one ? And how do costs compare — we can’t keep chucking money at the NHS. It isn’t fit for what we pay
@NotRight510710 @ClareCraigPath Private hospital there was 3 consultants seeing patients for  same orthopaedics ! ..
@ClareCraigPath They still have no authority at all since consent is required for all medical procedures and treatments.
@ClareCraigPath But but, we can see their smiles through their masks.
